blogPost.excerpt: Aqueux is a collection of ultra high-resolution dynamic wallpapers, inspired by an OS X classic — available in several wide-gamut color editions, with easy installation on macOS, and a free set available for mobile devices.
blogPost.body: Aqueux is a collection of ultra high-resolution dynamic wallpapers, inspired by an OS X classic — available in several wide-gamut color editions, with easy installation on macOS, and a free set available for mobile devices.
blogPost.title: Aqueux Wallpapers - A collection of dynamic wallpapers, for desktop and mobile
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Aqueux是一个超高分辨率动态壁纸的集合，灵感来自于OS X的经典之作--有几个宽广的gamut颜色版本，可在macOS上轻松安装，并为移动设备提供免费套装。
localize.tagline: 一系列动态壁纸，适用于桌面和手机。

localize.description: Aqueux是一個超高分辨率動態壁紙的集合，靈感來自於OS X的經典之作--有幾個寬廣的gamut顏色版本，可在macOS上輕鬆安裝，併爲移動設備提供免費套裝。
localize.tagline: 一系列動態壁紙，適用於桌面和手機。

previous.excerpt: Some rooms are just too big to engage with your Clubhouse audience. AskClubhouse is a free tool that allows your listeners to ask written questions, so you pick them and answer them live on stage.
previous.title: AskClubhouse - Allow your Clubhouse audience to ask written questions

localize.description: 有些房间实在太大，无法与你的Clubhouse听众互动。AskClubhouse是一个免费的工具，它允许你的听众提出书面问题，所以你选择他们并在舞台上现场回答他们。
localize.tagline: 允许您的会所观众提出书面问题

localize.description: 有些房間實在太大，無法與你的Clubhouse聽衆互動。AskClubhouse是一個免費的工具，它允許你的聽衆提出書面問題，所以你選擇他們並在舞臺上現場回答他們。
localize.tagline: 允許您的會所觀衆提出書面問題

next.excerpt: Based on the AI technology, we train the system to remove scratches and restore the old family photographs in one click. It is difficult to repair damaged photos without advanced PhotoShop skills. But now, you can do it like a pro with 3 steps!
next.title: Image Colorizer Repair - Repair old, damaged photographs and remove Scratches online

localize.description: 基于人工智能技术，训练系统一键去除划痕，还原家庭老照片。如果没有高超的PhotoShop技术，是很难修复受损照片的。但现在，你只需3步，就能像专业人员一样完成!
localize.tagline: 修复旧的，损坏的照片和去除划痕在线。

localize.description: 基於人工智能技術，訓練系統一鍵去除劃痕，還原家庭老照片。如果沒有高超的PhotoShop技術，是很難修復受損照片的。但現在，你只需3步，就能像專業人員一樣完成!
localize.tagline: 修復舊的，損壞的照片和去除劃痕在線。
